title: Decay pop up
body: I logged on today and got a pop up stating i was gonna begin to decay in 7 days... however i played a ranked game 3 days ago? did the decay time go down? and do i have anything to worry about?

replies.body: That message is probably about a specific queue like Flex SR, and you weren't playing matches in Ranked Solo for instance. Those decay warnings are always about a specific queue that is about to decay and you need to play a match *in that queue* to stop it.
